rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Open space with a reception area that follows traditional Kerala design. Entrance designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional wooden beams and stone flooring, oriented east-west per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space integrated within the living room. Vastu guidelines ensure a harmonious flow between spaces.

rooms.name: Traditional Kerala Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern amenities while preserving traditional Kerala elements, wheelchair accessible pathways provided.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-placed guest washroom near the living area for easy access. Vastu compliant location ensuring natural light and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Cozy family space with traditional Kerala architectural influences, ensuring social interaction as per Vastu.

openings.description: Traditional wooden entrance door that is wheelchair accessible, designed following Kerala architecture.
Secondary exit for emergency and service purposes, wheelchair friendly with ramp access.

utilities.name: Infinity Pool
utilities.description: A modern yet traditional styled swimming pool integrated into the landscape design. Vastu guidelines ensure water element is in the south-west area for cooling effects.

utilities.name: Private Gymnasium
utilities.description: Dedicated fitness space with wheelchair accessible exercise equipment and traditional Kerala aesthetic touches.
